Title: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection') in gatsby-plugin-mdx.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.14.1, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.15.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 2.14.1 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.15.2
